text: The 1943 Stanley Cup Finals was a 1943 competition for the Stanley Cup. It was a best-of-seven competition between the Boston Bruins and the Detroit Red Wings. This was the 3rd time that The Red Wings was in a Stanley Cup final. In this event, they beat the Bruins and won their 3rd Stanley Cup. ==Game summaries== ==Related pages== * 1942â€“43 NHL season ==References and notes== * * Podnieks, Andrew; Hockey Hall of Fame (2004). Lord Stanley's Cup. Bolton, Ont.: Fenn Pub. pp 12, 50. * Category:Stanley Cup Finals Category:1943 in sports Category:20th century in Michigan Category:Boston Bruins Category:Detroit Red Wings Category:Detroit Category:20th century in Boston Category:Ice hockey competitions
title: 1943 Stanley Cup Finals
